quote: Why, you mean you didn't get abducted and dragged across country purely to make us a story for us to chew over endlessly?"" asked Pip, tossing his shock of tow-colored hair indignantly. ""The nerve!
quote_letters: WHY YOU MEAN YOU DIDNT GET ABDUCTED AND DRAGGED ACROSS COUNTRY PURELY TO MAKE US A STORY FOR US TO CHEW OVER ENDLESSLY ASKED PIP TOSSING HIS SHOCK OF TOW-COLORED HAIR INDIGNANTLY THE NERVE
